FuncDef: This command enables per session accounting mode. In per session accounting mode, the acct-session-id is generated per session. This acct-session-id is uniformly included in all accounting messages (START/INTERIM-UPDATE/STOP) and it can be included in RADIUS Access-Request message.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to enable interim updates. Without this keyword only START and STOP accounting messages are generated when the session is established or terminated. This is equivalent to a time-based accounting where only the duration of the session is required.
Indicates that host updates messages are sent. INTERIM-UPDATE messages can be generated (volume based accounting) by selecting this keyword.
